title: Bed Chem
author: Sabrina Carpenter
lyrics:
[00:10.64] I was in a sheer dress the day that we met
[00:13.14] We were both in a rush, we talked for a sec
[00:15.89] Your friend hit me up so we could connect
[00:18.39] And what are the odds? You send me a text
[00:20.65] And now the next thing I know, I'm like
[00:23.34] Manifest that you're oversized
[00:25.71] I digress, got me scrolling like
[00:28.23] Out of breath, got me going like
[00:30.66] Ooh (ah)
[00:32.46] Who's the cute boy with the white jacket and the thick accent? Like
[00:36.26] Ooh (ah)
[00:37.30] Maybe it's all in my head
[00:39.76] But I bet we'd have really good bed chem
[00:43.40] How you pick me up, pull 'em down, turn me 'round
[00:45.70] Oh, it just makes sense
[00:48.46] How you talk so sweet when you're doing bad things
[00:51.18] That's bed (bed) chem (chem)
[00:53.57] How you're lookin' at me, yeah, I know what that means
[00:56.03] And I'm obsessed
[00:58.62] Are you free next week? I bet we'd have really good-
[01:01.87] Come right on me, I mean camaraderie
[01:04.36] Said you're not in my time zone, but you wanna be
[01:06.74] Where art thou? Why not uponeth me?
[01:09.06] See it in my mind, let's fulfill the prophecy
[01:11.31] Ooh (ah)
[01:12.76] Who's the cute guy with the wide, blue eyes and the big bad mm? Like
[01:16.78] Ooh (ah)
[01:17.77] I know I sound a bit redundant
[01:19.85] But I bed we'd have really good bed chem
[01:23.83] How you pick me up, pull 'em down, turn me 'round
[01:26.05] Oh, it just makes sense (oh, it just makes sense)
[01:28.90] How you talk so sweet when you're doing bad things (bad)
[01:31.58] That's bed chem (oh, that's bed chem)
[01:33.94] How you're lookin' at me, yeah, I know what that means
[01:36.50] And I'm obsessed (so obsessed)
[01:39.03] Are you free next week? I bet we'd have really good (bed chem)
[01:44.08] And I bet we'd both arrive at the same time (bed chem)
[01:49.01] And I bet the thermostat's set at six-nine (be-bed, ch-chem)
[01:54.26] And I bet it's even better than in my head (my)
[01:59.15] How you pick me up, pull 'em down, turn me 'round (ooh)
[02:01.46] Oh, it just makes sense (oh, it just makes sense)
[02:04.32] How you talk so sweet when you're doing bad things
[02:06.75] That's bed chem (oh, that's bed chem)
[02:09.24] How you're lookin' at me, yeah, I know what that means
[02:11.73] And I'm obsessed (so obsessed)
[02:14.34] Are you free next week? (Are you free next week?) I bet we'd have really good-
[02:17.50] Ha (make me go), ha
[02:20.50] No-no-no
[02:22.51] Ha (make me go), ha
[02:24.43] No-no-no, no, oh, no, oh
[02:27.43] Ha (make me go, yeah), ha (yeah)
[02:30.79] No-no-no, oh
[02:32.58] Ha (make me go), ha
[02:34.87] Ooh, oh, baby
[02:40.35] (A little fade out?)
[02:41.99]
